meta.title: Golden Retriever Shedding: How to Manage the Fur
meta.description: Golden Retrievers shed a lot. Learn how to manage their double coat, reduce shedding, and keep your home clean.

overview: Goldens have a double coat that sheds year-round and 'blows' twice a year. Regular grooming is non-negotiable to keep fur under control.
symptoms: Clumps of hair (tumbleweeds) on the floor

solutions.title: Daily Brushing
solutions.description: Use a slicker brush and undercoat rake to remove loose fur before it hits the floor.

solutions.title: High-Quality Diet
solutions.description: Omega-3 fatty acids promote skin health and can reduce excessive shedding.

solutions.title: De-Shedding Shampoo
solutions.description: Bathing with specialized shampoo helps loosen dead undercoat.
